sections.title: 1 cup flour
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup flour
o
1 cup water
o
1 egg
o
1/2 cup green onions
o
1/2 cup seafood (optional)
o
1 tablespoon soy sauce
o
1 tablespoon sesame oil
*

sections.title: Mix flour water
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl.
o
Add chopped green onions and seafood (if using).
o
Heat sesame oil in a pan and pour in batter.
o
Cook until golden on both sides.
o
Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

sections.title: Mix flour water
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 baguette
o
4 tomatoes
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Slice baguette and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Slice baguette and toast until golden.
o
Rub toasted bread with cut garlic cloves.
o
Grate tomatoes and spread on bread.
o
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
o
Serve immediately.

sections.title: Slice baguette and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound paneer
o
1/2 cup yogurt
o
1 tablespoon lemon juice
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon coriander
o
1 teaspoon garam masala
o
1 teaspoon turmeric

sections.title: Cut paneer into
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut paneer into cubes.
o
Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a
bowl.
o
Add paneer cubes and marinate for at least 1 hour.
o
Thread paneer onto skewers.
o
Grill or broil until golden, turning occasionally.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Cut paneer into
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 cups cubed bread
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 cucumber
o
1 small red onion
o
1/4 cup basil
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Toast bread cubes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Toast bread cubes until golden.
o
Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o
Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil.
o
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and salt, then pour over salad.
o
Toss well and serve.
Papadum
*

sections.title: Toast bread cubes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup urad dal flour
o
1/4 cup water
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Mix urad dal flour
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
o
Roll dough into thin circles.
o
Fry in hot oil until crispy.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve.

sections.title: Mix urad dal flour
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1/4 cup olive oil

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and dice potatoes.
o
Toss potatoes with olive oil and salt, then roast at 400degF (200degC) until crispy.
o
Mix tomato sauce, paprika, and cayenne pepper in a bowl.
o
Serve potatoes with tomato sauce and a dollop of mayonnaise.

sections.title: Peel and dice potatoes
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound beef
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 cups beef broth
o
1 cup spinach
o
1 cup okra
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Saute diced beef
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced beef, onion, and minced garlic until browned.
o
Add beef broth, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 1 hour.
o
Stir in spinach and okra, cook until tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced beef
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound chicken thighs
o
1/4 cup peri-peri sauce
o
2 tablespoons olive oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Marinate chicken
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Marinate chicken in peri-peri sauce, olive oil, salt, and pepper for at least 1 hour.
o
Preheat oven to 400degF (200degC).
o
Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked
through.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Dice tomatoes onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice tomatoes, onion, and jalapeno.
o
Chop cilantro.
o
Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
o
Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and add salt.
o
Mix well and serve.

sections.title: Pimientos de Padron
sections.context:
Pimientos de Padron
*

sections.title: Pimientos de Padron
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound Padron peppers
o
2 tablespoons olive oil
o
1 teaspoon sea salt
*

sections.title: Heat olive oil in
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Heat olive oil in a pan.
o
Add Padron peppers and saute until blistered and tender.
o
Sprinkle with sea salt and serve warm.

sections.title: Heat olive oil in
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 green plantains
o
1 cup vegetable oil
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Peel and slice plantains
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and slice plantains thinly.
o
Heat oil in a pan and fry plantain slices until crispy.
o
Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt.
o
Serve warm.
Polenta
*

sections.title: Peel and slice plantains
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup cornmeal
o
4 cups water
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
2 tablespoons butter
o
1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
*

sections.title: Bring water and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Bring water and salt to a boil.
o
Gradually whisk in cornmeal.
o
Reduce heat and cook, stirring constantly, until thickened (about 30 minutes).

sections.title: Bring water and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
2 eggs
o
1 small onion
o
1/2 cup mayonnaise
o
2 tablespoons mustard
o
1 tablespoon vinegar
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.
o
Hard-boil eggs, then chop.
o
Mix potatoes, eggs, diced onion, mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
o
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast
o
1 teaspoon sugar
o
1 cup warm water
o
3 cups flour
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 cup baking soda
o
1 egg
o
Coarse salt
*

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.
o
Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture.
o
Knead until smooth, then let rise until doubled.
o
Divide dough into pieces and roll into ropes, then shape into pretzels.
o
Boil water with baking soda and dip pretzels in the solution.
o
Place on a baking sheet, brush with beaten egg, and sprinkle with coarse salt.
o
Bake at 450degF (230degC) for 12-15 minutes until golden.
o
Serve warm.
Pulao
*

sections.title: Dissolve yeast and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup basmati rice
o
2 cups water
o
1 small onion

sections.title: Rinse rice and soak
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Rinse rice and soak in water for 30 minutes.
o
Heat oil in a pan and saute diced onion until translucent.
o
Add diced carrot, peas, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala, cook for 1
minute.
o
Drain rice and add to the pan, stir to coat with spices.
o
Add water and bring to a boil.
o
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and water is absorbed.
o
Add salt to taste and serve.

sections.title: Rinse rice and soak
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 flour tortillas
o
2 cups shredded cheese
o
1/2 cup diced cooked chicken (optional)
o
1/4 cup chopped cilantro
o
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
*

sections.title: Place a tortilla
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Heat oil in a pan.
o
Place a tortilla in the pan and sprinkle with cheese, chicken, and cilantro.
o
Top with another tortilla.
o
Cook until cheese is melted and tortilla is golden, then flip and cook the other
side.
o
Cut into wedges and serve.

sections.title: Place a tortilla
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pie crust
o
6 slices bacon
o
1 small onion
o
1 cup grated Gruyere cheese
o
3 eggs
o
1 cup heavy cream
o
1/2 teaspoon salt
o
1/4 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Place a tortilla
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups sugar
o
1 cup coconut
o
1/4 cup butter
o
10 egg yolks
o
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Preheat oven to 350degF (175degC).
o
Mix sugar, coconut, melted butter, egg yolks, and vanilla extract in a bowl.
o
Pour mixture into greased muffin tins.
o
Bake for 30-35 minutes until set and golden.
o
Let cool before removing from tins.
o
Serve chilled.
Raita
*

sections.title: Preheat oven to
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup yogurt
o
1/2 cucumber
o
1/4 cup mint
o
1/4 teaspoon cumin
o
1/4 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Grate cucumber and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess moisture.
o
Mix yogurt with cucumber, chopped mint, cumin, and salt.
o
Serve chilled.

sections.title: Grate cucumber and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 eggplant
o
1 zucchini
o
1 bell pepper
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 teaspoon thyme

sections.title: Dice eggplant zucchini
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened.
o
Add eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, tomatoes, thyme, rosemary, and salt.
o
Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
o
Serve warm.
Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir-Fried Morning Glory with Garlic)
*

sections.title: Dice eggplant zucchini
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound morning glory
o
4 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
*

sections.title: Saute minced garlic
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute minced garlic in vegetable oil until fragrant.
o
Add morning glory and stir-fry until tender.
o
Add fish sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute minced garlic
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups cooked pinto beans
o
1/4 cup lard or vegetable oil
o
1 small onion
o
1 clove garlic
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Heat lard or oil in a pan and saute diced onion and minced garlic until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Heat lard or oil in a pan and saute diced onion and minced garlic until
translucent.
o
Add beans and mash with a potato masher.
o
Cook, stirring frequently, until beans are thickened.
o
Add salt to taste and serve.
Rfissa
*

sections.title: Heat lard or oil in a pan and saute diced onion and minced garlic until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound chicken
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon turmeric
o
1 teaspoon ginger

sections.title: Saute chicken diced
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute chicken, diced onion, and minced garlic in olive oil until browned.
o
Add cumin, turmeric, ginger, and salt, cook for 1 minute.
o
Add chicken broth and lentils, simmer until chicken is cooked and lentils are
tender.
o
Stir in chopped cilantro.
o
Tear flatbread into pieces and place in a serving dish.
o
Pour chicken and sauce over the bread and serve warm.

sections.title: Saute chicken diced
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup rice
o
1 cup coconut milk
o
1 cup water
o
1/2 cup kidney beans
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic until softened.
o
Add rice, coconut milk, water, kidney beans, thyme, and salt.
o
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound pork shoulder
o
1/2 cup duck fat
o
1/4 cup white wine
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Cut pork into small
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut pork into small pieces.
o
Cook pork with duck fat, wine, thyme, salt, and pepper in a pot over low heat
until very tender (about 3 hours).
o
Shred pork with a fork and pack into jars.

sections.title: Cut pork into small
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 cup Arborio rice
o
4 cups chicken broth
o
1/2 cup white wine
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
o
2 tablespoons butter
o
1 tablespoon olive oil
*

sections.title: Heat broth in a
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Heat broth in a pot and keep warm.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until translucent.
o
Add rice and cook until lightly toasted.
o
Pour in wine and cook until absorbed.
o
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed.
o
Continue until rice is creamy and tender.
o
Stir in butter and grated Parmesan cheese.
o
Serve immediately.
Rosti (Potato Pancakes)
*

sections.title: Heat broth in a
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
1 small onion
o
1/4 cup flour
o
1 egg
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Grate potatoes and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Grate potatoes and onion, then squeeze out excess moisture.
o
Mix with flour, beaten egg, salt, and pepper.
o
Form mixture into patties.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden on both sides.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
Rotkohl (Braised Red Cabbage)
*

sections.title: Grate potatoes and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 head red cabbage
o
1 small onion
o
1 apple

sections.title: Shred cabbage and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Shred cabbage and slice onion and apple.
o
Saute onion in a pot until softened.
o
Add cabbage, apple, vinegar, sugar, water, salt, and pepper.
o
Simmer for 45 minutes until cabbage is tender.
o
Serve warm.

sections.title: Shred cabbage and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1/2 pound kefalotyri cheese
o
1/4 cup flour
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1 lemon
*

sections.title: Cut cheese into
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut cheese into slices.
o
Dredge cheese in flour.
o
Heat olive oil in a pan and fry cheese until golden on both sides.
o
Squeeze lemon juice over the top and serve immediately.

sections.title: Cut cheese into
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 tomatoes
o
1 cucumber
o
1 small red onion
o
1/4 cup olives
o
1/4 cup green beans
o
2 hard-boiled eggs
o
1 can tuna
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o
1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Dice tomatoes and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o
Blanch green beans until tender.
o
Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate.
o
Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad.
o
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad.
o
Toss gently and serve.

sections.title: Dice tomatoes and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups shredded chicken
o
1 small onion
o
1 carrot
o
1 apple
o
1/4 cup raisins
o
1/4 cup mayonnaise
o
1/4 cup parsley
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Dice onion grate
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Dice onion, grate carrot, and chop apple.
o
Mix shredded chicken with onion, carrot, apple, raisins, mayonnaise, chopped
parsley, and salt.
o
Serve chilled.

sections.title: Dice onion grate
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound salted cod
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1/2 cup flour
o
1/4 cup water
o
1 teaspoon thyme
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
Oil for frying
*

sections.title: Soak salted cod
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Soak salted cod in water overnight, then rinse and flake.
o
Mix cod with diced onion, minced garlic, flour, water, thyme, and salt.
o
Form mixture into fritters.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
Samosa
*

sections.title: Soak salted cod
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
2 cups flour
o
1/4 cup oil
o
1/2 cup water
o
2 potatoes
o
1/2 cup peas
o
1 small onion
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon coriander

sections.title: Mix flour oil and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix flour, oil, and water to form a dough, then let rest.
o
Boil and mash potatoes, then mix with peas, diced onion, and spices.
o
Roll dough into circles, cut in half, and form cones.
o
Fill cones with potato mixture and seal edges.
o
Fry in hot oil until golden.
o
Serve warm.
Satay
*

sections.title: Mix flour oil and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound chicken breast
o
1/4 cup coconut milk
o
2 tablespoons soy sauce
o
2 tablespoons peanut butter
o
1 tablespoon curry powder
o
1 tablespoon brown sugar
o
Skewers
*

sections.title: Cut chicken into
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers.
o
Mix coconut milk, soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, and brown sugar in a
bowl.
o
Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour.
o
Grill or broil until cooked through.
o
Serve with peanut sauce.

sections.title: Cut chicken into
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 head cabbage
o
1 tablespoon sea salt
o
1 teaspoon caraway seeds
*

sections.title: Shred cabbage and
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Shred cabbage and mix with sea salt and caraway seeds.
o
Pack cabbage into a jar and press down to release juices.
o
Cover and let ferment at room temperature for 1-2 weeks.
o
Store in the refrigerator and serve as needed.

sections.title: Shred cabbage and
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 bell pepper

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Saute diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened.
o
Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well.
o
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
o
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

sections.title: Saute diced onion
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 pound chicken thighs
o
1/4 cup yogurt
o
2 tablespoons lemon juice
o
2 cloves garlic
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 teaspoon paprika
o
1 teaspoon turmeric
o
1 teaspoon salt
o
1/2 teaspoon pepper
*

sections.title: Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper
in a bowl.
o
Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 2 hours.
o
Preheat oven to 400degF (200degC).
o
Arrange chicken on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes until cooked
through.
o
Slice and serve with pita bread and toppings.

sections.title: Mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 potatoes
o
4 cloves garlic
o
1/4 cup olive oil
o
1/4 cup lemon juice
o
1 teaspoon salt
*

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.
o
Blend mashed potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and salt until
smooth.

sections.title: Boil potatoes until
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
1 green papaya
o
2 tomatoes
o
1 carrot
o
2 cloves garlic
o
2 tablespoons fish sauce
o
2 tablespoons lime juice
o
1 tablespoon sugar
o
1 tablespoon peanuts
o
1-2 Thai chilies
*

sections.title: Peel and shred green
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Peel and shred green papaya and carrot.
o
Crush garlic and chilies in a mortar and pestle.
o
Add fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar, mix well.
o
Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing.
o
Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.

sections.title: Peel and shred green
sections.context:
Ingredients
:
o
4 corn tortillas
o
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
o
1 small onion
o
2 cloves garlic
o
4 cups chicken broth
o
2 tomatoes
o
1 teaspoon cumin
o
1 avocado
o
1/4 cup cilantro
*

sections.title: Cut tortillas into
sections.context:
Instructions
:
o
Cut tortillas into strips and fry in oil until crispy.
o
Saute diced onion and minced garlic in a pot until translucent.
o
Add diced tomatoes and cumin, cook for 5 minutes.
o
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.
o
Simmer for 10 minutes.
o
Serve soup topped with tortilla strips, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro.
